name: Dwarf Undecided
description:
Dwarf Undecided is a game where you are taking care of your mothers weapon shop for a few days. The game is a shopkeeping simulator that tests your knowledge of the weapons in your stock and their use. Customers only describe what monster they will hunt. It’s up to you to figure out what to give them, to help you you have a book that contains information about weapons and monsters. At the end of the day you get to read some newspaper articles which contain stories of how well the customers did on their hunts. The results are based on how well suited the weapons they got were for the monster they were hunting. The result has an effect on how much money you get from your customers.  If they do well they add a tip but if they do poorly they will issue a fee.

The goal of the game is to earn money which can be used to buy weapons to restock the store or licenses which allows you to buy new weapons for the store which can be used to fulfill more inch customer requests.
